channel.title: [PI] Adding a Crossbow
channel.description:
Since nobody has wrote about this I decided to open a topic about it.
Purpose: To learn how to add a crossbow (Chaotic Crossbow)
Ive tried everything Ive tried for 3 hours to add this but all I get is "You cannot use "arrowname" with "chaotic crossbow". And It's pissing me off! Ive nearly tried everything just to tired for this shit. If anyone can help then thank you.

item.title: [PI] Adding a Crossbow
item.dc:creator: @pixanocu pixanocu
item.description:
@pixanocu wrote:

[quote=“P A N I C, post:2, topic:387360”]1. add models
2. add ints
3. combile

done.
(more complex then this but its still kind of easy)[/quote]

LOOL

You must be kiding no?
And the methods to declare it as a crossbow make it using bolts LOL.

Read full topic
